document_data.name: Ptola
document_data.aliases: Kamlann, Murklar, Thurn Blackskull, Wendyll Thintoworth
document_data.mainbody: '''Ptola''' was a [[doppelganger]] and a senior member of the [[Unseen]] in [[Waterdeep]] in [[1370]]. and [[1372]].
document_data.Personality: Ptola was a cold and scheming creature, with a habit of torturing its victims before killing them and taking their identities.
document_data.History: In 1372 DR, Ptola discovered and eliminated [[Jurisk Ulhammond]], a leader of the [[Red Sashes]] in [[Waterdeep]]. The identity of Jurisk was stolen by the shapeshifter but [[Hlaavin]], the leader of the Unseen, was undecided about what to do with their newfound position and what Jurisk knew about [[Durnan]].
document_data.Alias: Ptola's roster of identities included '''Kamlann''', a member of the [[Dungsweepers' Guild]]; '''Murklar''', a penitent hunchback and janitor of the [[Wyvern's Rest]] inn; '''Thurn Blackskull''', a [[duergar]] fence in [[Skullport]] (having replaced the real [[Thurn Blackskull]]); and '''Wendyll Thintoworth''', one of the two [[half-elf]] members of [[Mask's Conscript]]s.
